ru.dz.ccu825.transport

Interface ModBusConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CCU825_j2mod_connector, EmptyModbusConnector, TestChatModbusConnector

    public interface ModBusConnection
    ModBus connection interface, as needed by CCU825 protocol.

    Just one function, interface is simplified to minimum.

    TODO rename to IModBusConnection

    Author:
    dz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Called before any attempt to use rwMultiple.
      void disconnect() 
      byte[] rwMultiple(int nRead, byte[] writeData)
      fn23 r/w multiple interface, reduced to what CU825 protocol needs.
      void setSpeed(int baud)
      Called before connect() to set serial port parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(int baud)
        Called before connect() to set serial port parameters.
        Parameters:
        baud - always 9600

      • connect

        void connect()
             throws CCU825Exception
        Called before any attempt to use rwMultiple.
        Throws:
        CCU825Exception

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()

      • rwMultiple

        byte[] rwMultiple(int nRead,
                byte[] writeData)
                  throws CCU825ProtocolException
        fn23 r/w multiple interface, reduced to what CU825 protocol needs. Write count is taken from writeData size.
        Parameters:
        nRead - number of 16 bit registers to read
        writeData - data to write
        Returns:
        bytes read
        Throws:
        CCU825Exception
        CCU825ProtocolException
